DDL.statement: ALTER TABLE SYS_MODULES ALTER COLUMN HELPSET_ID varchar(250)
ALTER TABLE app_despatch ALTER COLUMN status varchar(20)
ALTER TABLE app_material ALTER COLUMN default_batch_status varchar(20)
ALTER TABLE app_material_batch ALTER COLUMN status varchar(20)
ALTER TABLE app_pallet ALTER COLUMN status varchar(20)
ALTER TABLE app_pallet_history ALTER COLUMN status varchar(20)
ALTER TABLE app_process_order ALTER COLUMN status varchar(20)
ALTER TABLE app_process_order ALTER COLUMN default_pallet_status varchar(20)
UPDATE SYS_MODULES set HELPSET_ID = REPLACE(HELPSET_ID,'commander4j\administration','commander4j\application\administration')
UPDATE SYS_MODULES SET HELPSET_ID = '{base_dir}\help\html\commander4j\application\administration\Setup\SystemKeys\SystemKeyAdmin.html' WHERE MODULE_ID= 'FRM_ADMIN_CONTROL_EDIT'
